name: ionic live-update configure
description:
This command overrides configuration for the Appflow Live Update plugin (`cordova-plugin-ionic`) in Capacitor projects.

For Capacitor projects, if the plugin is already installed, it overrides the configuration variables in the native projects.

For Cordova projects this is not implemented because it is better to reinstall the plugin with the different parameters and let Cordova deal with the changes.

options.name: channel-name
options.summary: The channel to check for updates from

options.name: update-method
options.summary: The update method that dictates the behavior of the plugin

options.name: max-store
options.summary: The maximum number of downloaded versions to store on the device

options.name: min-background-duration
options.summary: The minimum duration after which the app checks for an update in the background
